# portkey_prompt_partials (Data Source)

Use this data source to get a list of Portkey prompt partials.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all prompt partials in a workspace
data "portkey_prompt_partials" "workspace_partials" {
  workspace_id = "ws-example-123456"
}

# List all prompt partials across all workspaces
data "portkey_prompt_partials" "all" {}

# Use prompt partial data
output "partial_count" {
  value = length(data.portkey_prompt_partials.workspace_partials.prompt_partials)
}

output "partial_names" {
  value = [for p in data.portkey_prompt_partials.workspace_partials.prompt_partials : p.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `workspace_id` (String) Optional workspace ID to filter prompt partials.

### Read-Only

- `prompt_partials` (List of Object) List of prompt partials. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--prompt_partials))

<a id="nestedatt--prompt_partials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `prompt_partials`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt partial was created.
- `id` (String) Prompt partial identifier (UUID).
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the prompt partial.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the prompt partial.
- `status` (String) Status of the prompt partial (active, archived).
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt partial was last updated.
